subject: Automobile Racing
Indianapolis 500 (Auto Race)
lead_paragraph: Anthony Joseph Foyt Jr. was a raw, skinny Texas kid with a lot of moxie and a little racing experience when he first strode through the gates of the Indianapolis Motor Speedway five decades ago.
snippet: Anthony Joseph Foyt Jr. was a raw, skinny Texas kid with a lot of moxie and a little racing experience when he first strode through the gates of the Indianapolis Motor Speedway five decades ago.
